title.rendered: Bitdefender Antivirus Plus | 2 Years | 1 Device | Windows | Downloadable

content.rendered:
Don’t Be a Victim of Cyber Attacks. Protect and Defend Yourself with Bitdefender. Bitdefender Antivirus Plus is an affordable antivirus product that provides superior protection against all types of online threats. Cyber-threats are lurking all around the internet, and as our lives become more intertwined with technology, the possibility of becoming a victim of a cyber attack grows. This goes beyond basic antivirus protection by integrating a safe-browsing engine that detects and removes trackers from the web pages you visit, so you get a safer online experience.

Anti-tracker technology detects and removes trackers from websites, which prevents the collection of your browsing data without your knowledge. This unique antivirus engine also prevents you from visiting known phishing sites and malicious sites that can infect your PC.

With Bitdefender, you can rest assured that you have the latest and greatest protection from both common and uncommon forms of attack such as: malware, ransomware, phishing, spyware, malicious unwanted programs spam, fraud, Wi-Fi sniffing, insecure online shopping, DDoS attacks, botnet attacks, spoofing, and so much more.
